channel.title: [CFM] Triangle Marathon - Mafia Wins!
channel.description:
# :triangular_flag_on_post: :running_woman: Welcome in [color=Orange]Triangle Marathon![/color] :running_man: ###### Hosted by Twil1ight
### [color=Orange]Rules[/color] :no_pedestrians: 1. All standard forum rules apply, as usual. 2. Any cheating, angleshooting etc are forbidden. 3. Please be respectful to other players and keep your salt through entire match to yourself. 4. Be active! After 24 hours you will be prodded and if you don’t answer in 12 hours, you would be replaced/modkilled. 5. Wisdom of the Mod is in effect in other words i can stop people from joining the game if i think their presence would potentially ruin the game for others. 6. Most importantly have fun!
### [color=Orange]Gameplay[/color] :small_red_triangle: 1. Days will be 48 hours and Nights will be 12 hours. 2. Voting is plurality + Majority. Ties will be broken by RNG. 3. The Mafia have one factional kill per night. Any member can perform it. 4. The Mafia have a day and night chat. 5. The Mafia member can **only** perform one action per night.
### [color=Orange]The Rolelist[/color] :clipboard: [color=green]**VIP**[/color] [color=green]**Bulletproof VIP Bodyguard**[/color] [color=green]**Civilized VIP Bodyguard**[/color] [color=green]**6x Citizen**[/color] [color=red]**Role Cop**[/color] [color=red]**Strongman**[/color] [color=red]**Mafia Backup**[/color]
[details="Rolecards"] > # [color=green]VIP[/color] > [color=green]Town Special[/color] > Players know you're VIP. If you die, the Mafia will automatically win. You can't be lynched at day. You know the identity of your Bodyguards. _Defeat the Mafia before they will get majority or kill you._
> # [color=green]Bulletproof VIP Bodyguard[/color] > [color=green]Town Protective[/color] > While you're alive, the VIP cannot be targered by the Mafia. You're immune to one attack at night. _Defeat the Mafia before they will get majority and before they kill the VIP._
> # [color=green]Civilized VIP Bodyguard[/color] > [color=green]Town Protective[/color] > While you're alive, the VIP cannot be targered by the Mafia. You appear as [color=green]Citizen[/color] for investigators. _Defeat the Mafia before they will get majority and before they kill the VIP._
> # [color=green]Citizen[/color] > [color=green]Town Social[/color] > You can't do anything, but at least you can vote at day. _Defeat the Mafia before they will get majority and before they kill the VIP._
> # [color=red]Role Cop[/color] > [color=red]Mafia Investigative[/color] > Each Night, you can determine player's role. _Defeat the Town or kill the VIP._
> # [color=red]Strongman[/color] > [color=red]Mafia Killing[/color] > If you're performing factional kill, your attack cannot be stopped. _Defeat the Town or kill the VIP._
> # [color=red]Mafia Backup[/color] > [color=red]Mafia Support[/color] > At Night, you can become deceased Mafia role. _Defeat the Town or kill the VIP._
[/details]
# [color=Orange]Players:[/color] :bowing_man: 1. <S> Geyde </S> - Died Night 2 - [color=Green]**Civilized VIP Bodyguard**[/color] 2. overthebin - [color=Green]**Citizen**[/color] 3. <S> Luxy </S> - Died Night 2 - [color=green]**VIP**[/color] :exclamation: 4. Marluxion - [color=red]**Strongman**[/color] 5. <S> Frostwolf103 </S> - Lynched Day 1 - [color=red]**Mafia Backup**[/color] 6. <S> Solic </S> - Died Night 1 - [color=Green]**Bulletproof VIP Bodyguard**[/color] 7. MaximusPrime - [color=Green]**Citizen**[/color] 8. Insanity - [color=Green]**Citizen**[/color] 9. bazingaboy - [color=Green]**Citizen**[/color] 10. Moleland - [color=red]**Role Cop**[/color] 11. <S> Qwert </S> - Lynched Day 2 - [color=Green]**Citizen**[/color] 12. PoisonedSquid - [color=Green]**Citizen**[/color]
# [color=Orange]Backup[/color] :+1: 1. 2.
# [color=Orange]Spectator Lobby[/color] :mag_right: 1. astand 2. Livicus 3. Wolfy 4. GamerPoke 5.
# [color=Orange]Shortcuts[/color] :link: [Start of Game / D1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/cfm-triangle-marathon-12-12-day-1-tea-party/73908/158) [D1 / Frostwolf's Lynch](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/cfm-triangle-marathon-12-12-day-1-tea-party/73908/504) [N1 / Start of D2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/cfm-triangle-marathon-12-12-day-1-tea-party/73908/505) [D2 / Qwert\'s Lynch](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/cfm-triangle-marathon-12-12-day-1-tea-party/73908/848) [N2 / End Of The Game](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/cfm-triangle-marathon-12-12-day-1-tea-party/73908/850)

item.title: [CFM] Triangle Marathon - Mafia Wins!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Solic:

Do try though Luxy.

Solic:

And the WIFOM of did you just out a bodyguard or not begins.

Solic:

You blatantly casted the WIFOM not me. Any scum would have been a colossal idiot not to have picked up on that.

I tried to signal to Luxy that he should push me harder with this, but maybe that backfired too.

Read full topic

item.title: [CFM] Triangle Marathon - Mafia Wins!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Luxy:

Solic is scum this game

Luxy:

/vote Frost

Luxy:

Im not like frost at all rn tbh

Luxy:

Right. I think frost is the lynch for today

Luxy:

You said you like memewagons and voted solic

Then when I voted you, you tried to deflect to marl

Luxy:

Are you trying to push a mislynch solic

Luxy:

Im not liking you one bit solic

Luxy:

/vote Solic

Luxy:

/vote Frostwolf
Now is not the time to be memeing

Luxy:

Who do you want to lynch more solic or frost

Luxy:

You are scummy

Luxy:

Can you stop taking memes so seriously

Luxy:

We’re lynching frost unless I say otherwise

Luxy:

Vote Frost

This is kind of super obvious if you know that Frost is scum, since Luxy has to know that Frost and I would be on the same scumteam, but that might be 20/20 hindsight.

Read full topic

item.title: [CFM] Triangle Marathon - Mafia Wins!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
There is a difference between replacing out and stepping away for a few hours and revisiting it a later time. It’s unacceptable to tactically replace out.

And if that’s not enough, then just accept the temporary blacklist. It’s not fun for the other players and one of the reasons why ATE is so thoroughly disliked. You make others feel bad for just playing the game. Either town really thinks you’re scum and is just doing what it should do or it’s scum pushing a mislynch. There is no place for salt there. It is on you that you cannot sufficiently defend yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: [CFM] Triangle Marathon - Mafia Wins!
item.dc:creator: BlueStorm
item.description:
Just as a point from an Aspie

It’s kinda hard to do this, especially in a situation whereby everyone turns on you and you panic because you feel like you have to justify your innocence, but people find a way to scumread that as well

We try our best but sometimes our coping mechanism IS to step away from the situation

I’ve even been told to do that by people when I’ve gotten angry, see 2d3 for that.

Read full topic
